segments.text: Hey , Terry , have all the players got here ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , most of them have arrived . Don't worry . There are still 20 minutes left before the match .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . By the way , the stadium is terrific .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course . It's a newly-built one .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We are lucky to play in a new stadium .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Hurry up , Benjamin ! Pass the ball to me . I'm good at shooting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Look out . Catch the ball . You should dunk besides the three-point line .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , God ! I didn't touch anybody . How can I commit a foul ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Just calm down . It's just a turnover . Make up your mind and we can shoot well .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , I got it . Come on , Benjamin , don't let him get into the paint .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No problem , I once played a 2 - meter-high player successfully .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: But that game he dunked over me for 13 times .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's interesting . Let's hurry up , we should beat them in the first half .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , look , what's happened to Jack ? He sat down .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: He may be injured . Yes , come on , call the team doctor .
segments.speaker: S2
